name: Paging Dr. Floppy!
description:
Paging Dr. Floppy is an arcade-style test of your reflexes, will, and aptitude as a medical professional. Catch organs as they fly across the operating room to increase your score and save Dr. Floppy's job!

Dr. Floppy is one lawsuit away from losing his medical license forever! Never one to give up, he hatches a plan: prove to the malpractice committee that he's the best surgeon in the world by performing four operations at once! They all called him crazy, they said it couldn't be done, they told him even if it works he'll be imprisoned for the rest of his natural life! No matter, it's now or never! Dr. Floppy can't afford to let the terrified pleas of his colleagues stop him, there's work to be done! 

Paging Dr. Floppy is an arcade-style game of skill and timing. As head surgeon, it is Dr. Floppy's job to catch all of the organs bursting from his grateful patients before they hit the ground. Direct Dr. Floppy left and right to nab the organs as they fly! As you successfully make catches, his patient's bill increases and lines the good doctor's pockets. Drop three organs and Dr. Floppy loses everything: his job, his standing, even his kids. His fate is in your hands.

Paging Dr. Floppy features hand-drawn art sure to mortify the squeamish and repel the faint of heart! Curse and sweat along with Dr. Floppy as he captures the hearts of his patients in the most hectic workday of your lives! Reel in horror at the doctor's brutal, senseless malpractice brought to life by our world class art team! The signature Strangest.io style is guaranteed to leave you saying "anyone but Dr. Floppy" on your next trip to the ER!

Strangest.io’s prime directive is to empower outsider artists to tell interactive, subversive, and powerful stories. We partner with independent artists on all of our projects. We believe that the best stories and ideas come from the fringes of our society. We are not here to make things that have been done before. We are here to break the mold, leave a mark, and feel good about the work we do.
